programme.desc: Returning season of the classic game show, hosted by Michael Strahan. With the help of their game partners, contestants paired with celebrities must guess words or phrases that appear on the show's pyramid-shaped gameboard to win money.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S1
programme.desc: In each episode, Adam Liaw is joined by 2 special guests - a combination of celebrity chefs, cooks and well-known personalities - and together they cook up a variety of dishes that centre around a nightly theme. They cook together sharing their knowledge, tips and tricks of the trade, for viewers to watch and follow their recipes at home. The Cook Up showcases all your favourite chefs, celebrities, culture, food and fun.

programme.title: Open Homes S5
programme.desc: Bessie starts us off in Melbourne with an award winning contemporary design, A kitchen tip and recipe you can do at home and at the climax Dave shows off his latest and greatest pool and landscape.

programme.title: Zoom, Zim, Zam
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday.

programme.title: Hiccup & Sneeze
programme.desc: Bibi encourages Hiccup and Sneeze to exercise, but they're not keen on the idea. Bibi even prepares a workout routine for them, but they trick her into thinking they're following it by pretending to exercise only when she checks in on them.

programme.title: Kit n Kate S1
programme.desc: Two small kitties named Kit and Kate love their toy box. As soon as they hop inside, magic starts to happen. Kid's imagination transforms their room into a blueberry island, race track or a medieval castle. Every time the kitties create a whole new world with amazing discoveries, surprises and not-so-easy-to-solve dilemmas.

programme.title: The Fixies S3
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.title: Ricky Zoom S1
programme.desc: Little red rescue motorbike Ricky Zoom, along with his loyal and enthusiastic bike buddies Loop, Scootio and DJ, race around the sports track, try new stunts at the park, and zoom into adventures.

programme.desc: Pinkfong crashes into the roof of a house, and in doing so, finds a best friend and problem-solving partner named Hogi. programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: When crises strike wild animals around the planet, a team of heroic seven-year-olds transform their high-tech backpacks into robotic pets and rush off on daring missions to rescue them. This team of heroic kids and their robotic pets stands on call, ready to leap into action when danger strikes animals around the world.

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series S24
programme.desc: It's a big, big world, but you know where to find Ash and Goh---battling and catching Pokemon from Kanto to Galar! With Pikachu, Cinderace, and their other Pokemon beside them, our heroes continue to travel all over the world to research Pokemon for Cerise Laboratory.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Hiro struggles with performance anxiety at the Inter-class Basketball competition. Things go awry when he accidentally brings forth a slimy version of his superhero self - The Blubbering.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Thrilled at the arrival of her first pimples, Celeste joins the Springwood's Acne Anonymous Forum. Tensions run high when an anonymous participant, "Tako", criticises Celeste for her toxic positivity.

programme.title: Tara Duncan
programme.desc: Tara Duncan is about an ordinary girl from earth who arrives on the magical planet OtherWorld to learn how to manage her uncontrollable powers and protect her family. There she must count on her new friends to solve mysteries and face evil forces.

programme.desc: Zari finds a mudskipper in an abandoned fish tank and releases it into the sea by mistake! The rangers have to race against time to save the mudskipper and bring it back to the mangroves.

programme.desc: Lampo is terrified by illness, and even more by Fisby, the doctor cat. With his thick moustache and his suitcase full of strange tools, Fisby is certainly not the most reassuring cat in the neighborhood. But it's Neighbor Day party and Lampo must recover at all costs if he wants to sing with the Buffycats!

programme.title: Tales From Sanctuary City - The Wishmas Tree
programme.desc: A young possum's misguided wish for a white Wishmas not only freezes her entire hometown of Sanctuary City, but also threatens the lives of all those who live there. Before the magical Wishmas Tree dies, she must undertake a perilous journey, battling self-doubt, ghostly predator gangs and ultimately, extinction itself, to reverse the damage she has caused and save Sanctuary City!

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the ranger's mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: The Atlantic Ocean is vast, wild and unforgiving. Stretching from the Antarctic in the south, to the Arctic in the north, the Americas in the west to Africa and Europe in the east, it covers 20% of the Earth's surface. It's irresistible power shapes lands with its unstoppable force. Each episode documents a different season in and around the Atlantic, through the lives of the animals that live there. Every season brings new challenges.

programme.desc: From freak tornadoes appearing out of nowhere, to pounding storms with hailstones the size of footballs... this fast-paced, adrenaline-filled, and shocking documentary series charts some of the most extreme weather from around the globe. Little does he know he's about to get what he wished for – in the form of Totto, a genius bunny who takes him on many fun and crazy adventures in science! Totally Totto is a live action series with an adorable puppet and animation-filled segments that brings science to your fingertips.

programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the ranger's latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. programme.title: Double Chin S2
programme.desc: Fei decides to spy on Ethan to see what he is up to. She is caught. Meanwhile, Zero is tempting Liwen into binge eating.

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore S3
programme.desc: The Top 10 arrive at Mandai Zoo and learn of their first team challenge. They are to create sustainable menus for zoo workers and supporters. Held at the Night Safari's tipi tent, the dinner is to raise awareness of the environmental impact our food choices have. The diners decide which team is safe from elimination. The losing team returns to the MasterChef Kitchen for an elimination challenge with Guest Chef Lisa Tang where they must impress with just one pan in one hour.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: The Wall UK S4

programme.title: 主廚大聯盟
programme.desc: (重) 料理节目的最高体现，就是在原产地用当地和当令食材于现场进行『创意料理』，此节目不但实现了这个体现，还一次出动三位大厨在同一个时间轴上，于三个不同的原产地进行料理。透过三个地点交叉式的剪辑，节奏不但明快，观众也能在一个小时的节目内，看到三场同时进行的创意料理秀。此节目没有油嘴滑舌的主持人，也没有模糊焦点的游戏或陈设，三位厨师本身就是主角，原汁原味无添加 ，体现料理的纯粹。.
